includedAssets.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
includedAssets.synopsis: In Middle-earth, a reluctant hobbit begins a treacherous journey to the lair of a dragon. Peter Jackson directs this epic quest.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In Middle-earth, a reluctant hobbit begins a treacherous journey to the lair of a dragon. Peter Jackson directs this epic quest.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In Middle-earth, a reluctant hobbit begins a treacherous journey to the lair of a dragon. Peter Jackson directs this epic quest.

includedAssets.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
includedAssets.synopsis: Martin Freeman returns as Bilbo Baggins, whose journey across Middle Earth edges closer to an epic showdown.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Martin Freeman returns as Bilbo Baggins, whose journey across Middle Earth edges closer to an epic showdown.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Martin Freeman returns as Bilbo Baggins, whose journey across Middle Earth edges closer to an epic showdown.

includedAssets.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
includedAssets.synopsis: The future of Middle-earth hangs in the balance as Peter Jackson's epic trilogy concludes. Action adventure with Martin Freeman.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The future of Middle-earth hangs in the balance as Peter Jackson's epic trilogy concludes. Action adventure with Martin Freeman.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The future of Middle-earth hangs in the balance as Peter Jackson's epic trilogy concludes. Action adventure with Martin Freeman.

includedAssets.title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Fellowship Of The Ring
includedAssets.synopsis: The first instalment of Peter Jackson's adaptation of JRR Tolkien's classic fantasy adventure sets the majestic tone for the trilogy. Elijah Wood stars as Frodo Baggins, the lowly hobbit who is enlisted by the great wizard Gandalf (Ian McKellen) to undertake an epic quest to save Middle-earth from the ever-growing forces of darkness. It's a mighty tale of myths and magic, greed and deception, courage and conviction, men and monsters, elves and dwarves... and the one ring that rules them all. The movie picked up Oscars for visual effects, make-up, score and cinematography.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Frodo and friends begin their heroic quest to defeat the forces of evil. A breathtaking start to Peter Jackson's epic trilogy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The first instalment of Peter Jackson's adaptation of JRR Tolkien's classic fantasy adventure sets the majestic tone for the trilogy. Elijah Wood stars as Frodo Baggins, the lowly hobbit who is enlisted by the great wizard Gandalf (Ian McKellen) to undertake an epic quest to save Middle-earth from the ever-growing forces of darkness. It's a mighty tale of myths and magic, greed and deception, courage and conviction, men and monsters, elves and dwarves... and the one ring that rules them all. The movie picked up Oscars for visual effects, make-up, score and cinematography.

includedAssets.title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Two Towers
includedAssets.synopsis: A tale of two towers and three adventures as a divided fellowship take different paths in their quest to destroy the One Ring. Despite climaxing in the spectacular Battle of Helms Deep and featuring an abundance of plucky hobbits, wise wizards, fearsome orcs, repugnant goblins and towering Ents, it's the wonderful Gollum (Andy Serkis) who steals the show (and the ring) in the second part of Peter Jackson's splendidses adaptation of JRR Tolkien's legendary trilogy. Won the Oscars for Best Sound and Visual Effects.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Frodo and Sam meet Gollum on their epic quest, while good and evil armies battle at Helms Deep. Spectacular second instalment in the epic trilogy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A tale of two towers and three adventures as a divided fellowship take different paths in their quest to destroy the One Ring. Despite climaxing in the spectacular Battle of Helms Deep and featuring an abundance of plucky hobbits, wise wizards, fearsome orcs, repugnant goblins and towering Ents, it's the wonderful Gollum (Andy Serkis) who steals the show (and the ring) in the second part of Peter Jackson's splendidses adaptation of JRR Tolkien's legendary trilogy. Won the Oscars for Best Sound and Visual Effects.

includedAssets.title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Return Of The King
includedAssets.synopsis: The epic journey through Middle-earth ends in a blaze of confrontations and conflagrations as Frodo (Elijah Wood) finally reaches Mordor, desolate home of the all-seeing epitome of evil, Sauron. As the hobbit's will to destroy the Ring wavers, new heroes emerge... and old villains await. Peter Jackson's monumental adaptation of JRR Tolkien's epic fantasy comes to an Oscar-winning end, leaving a cinematic legacy that few - maybe none - shall pass.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Frodo and Gollum reach Mordor as good and evil forces do battle. The stunning, multi-Oscar-winning last act of Peter Jackson's fantasy trilogy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The epic journey through Middle-earth ends in a blaze of confrontations and conflagrations as Frodo (Elijah Wood) finally reaches Mordor, desolate home of the all-seeing epitome of evil, Sauron. As the hobbit's will to destroy the Ring wavers, new heroes emerge... and old villains await. Peter Jackson's monumental adaptation of JRR Tolkien's epic fantasy comes to an Oscar-winning end, leaving a cinematic legacy that few - maybe none - shall pass.

includedAssets.title: Middle Earth 6 Film Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Journey to Middle-earth with Peter Jackson's epic adaptations of JRR Tolkien’s The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings. A reluctant hobbit joins a band of dwarves on their quest to find an ancient treasure and reclaim their homeland. Years later, his nephew joins eight companions on a perilous mission to destroy a magical ring. Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Benedict Cumberbatch, Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen and Orlando Bloom star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Journey to Middle-earth with Peter Jackson's epic adaptations of JRR Tolkien’s The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit. Ian McKellen stars.
